main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a single unidentified object with a blue body and reddish tail moving in a northerly direction in Hereford, Texas.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for only 2 seconds and was observed at an elevation of 2 degrees., The object disappeared instantaneously at the horizon on an azimuth heading of 100 degrees., The observer described the object as being about the size of a grapefruit (5-7 inches in diameter)., The report concluded that the sighted object was likely a meteor., The observer was a housewife and her reliability was estimated as not reliable.
sighted object: one round object with blue body and reddish tail
witness description: Mrs. Jane Doe, age 44, housewife from Clovis, New Mexico
